original_title: INSEE Cement launches ‘INSEE Nawa Niwasa’ mobile app to simplify construction in Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: INSEE Cement has announced the official launch of the INSEE Nawa Niwasa Mobile App, a cutting-edge digital platform designed to transform the construction process and put essential services, materials, and expert guidance directly into the hands of our customers. With this user-friendly app, homeowners, architects, masons, and other stakeholders can now access everything they need for their projects—quickly, efficiently, and confidently—right at their fingertips.

The INSEE Nawa Niwasa App empowers users by connecting them with qualified builders and trusted suppliers of INSEE Cement and premium building materials. The app simplifies project management so that users can tackle their construction challenges with ease, whether they are building a home or overseeing a larger project.
